data.name: GRANTS
data.description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

data.name: INTEREST SUBSIDY
data.description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

data.name: CAPITAL SUBSCRIPTION
data.description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

data.name: LOAN
data.description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

data.name: EXPORT CREDIT
data.description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

data.name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES
data.description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.

data.name: DEBT RELIEF
data.description: Debt cancellations, debt conversions, debt rescheduling within or outside the framework of the Paris Club.

data.name: INVESTMENT
data.description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

data.name: BONDS
data.description: Acquisition of bonds issued by developing countries.

data.name: GUARANTEES AND OTHER UNFUNDED CONTINGENT LIABILITIES

metadata.name: Finance Type (category)
metadata.description: This codelists exists to group the Finance Type codelist into categories. It is not used as a codelist in its own right.
